ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), not($User.Alias = 'aivan'), not($User.Alias = 'gthom'), not($User.Alias = 'slam'), not($User.Alias = 'bmath'), not($User.Alias = 'lcruz'), not($User.Alias = 'JMorr'), not($User.Alias = 'zbolt') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to change the owner of leads!
